argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmf.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | nmf.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ngpms | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. MetSp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( dist ` G ) |` ( X X. X ) ) = ( ( dist ` G ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_msmet | |- ( G e. MetSp -> ( ( dist ` G ) |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> ( ( dist ` G ) |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 9 | 2, 1, 8, 5 | #P_nmf2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( ( dist ` G ) |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) -> N : X --> RR ) |
| 10 | 3, 7, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> N : X --> RR ) |
